      • main

        The main method.
        Parameters:

      • getquote

        public static java.lang.String getquote()
        Gets the quote. Get the quote from the input file.
        Returns:
        the quote

      • decryption

        public static void decryption(java.lang.String encrypted_quotes,
                              java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Character> cryptogram,
                              java.lang.String target)
        decryption is using additional hashmap to store the user guesses and mapping to their hashmap and show them their progress by using the hashmap to replace the encrypted characters with their guess ones.
        Parameters:
        encrypted_quotes - the string that only contain punctuation
        cryptogram - the hashmap that contain the correct the mapping.
        target - the quotes that has already been encrypted.

      • help

        public static void help()
        print all valid command.

      • hint

        public static void hint(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Character> cryptogram,
                        java.lang.String encrypted_quotes,
                        java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> guess_str,
                        java.lang.String target)
        hint function is to display one correct mapping that has not yet been guessed. First find one character that has not been guessed, and then, using cryptogram to get the correct mapping and display. Finally, check whether user is get the whole mapping correct.
        Parameters:
        cryptogram - the hashmap that contain the correct the mapping.
        encrypted_quotes - the string that only contain punctuation
        guess_str - the list store the user guess
        target - the quotes that has already been encrypted.

      • print_freq

        public static void print_freq(java.lang.String encrypted_quotes)
        print_freq is to display the letter frequencies in the encrypted quotation. First create an additional hashmap to store the frequency. Then loop the encrypted_quotes to find the frequency. Finally, print the frequency 7 per line for 4 lines.
        Parameters:
        encrypted_quotes - the string that has already been encrypted.

      • check_valid

        public static void check_valid(java.lang.String which,
                               java.lang.String replacement)
        check_valid function is to check user's input whether or not is valid.
        Parameters:
        which - replace letter
        replacement - replacement letter

      • encryption

        public static java.lang.String encryption(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Character,java.lang.Character> cryptogram,
                                          java.lang.String target)
        Encrypt the quotes that randomly chosen. Create a new string to store encrypted quotes. Keep the same punctuation and only encrypt letter.
        Parameters:
        cryptogram - the hashmap the contain the correct mapping.
        target - the quotes that randomly chosen.
        Returns:
        the encrypted string
